availability.p: All research and writing of Civil War Governors of Kentucky Digital Documentary Edition annotations was undertaken by project staff, volunteers, and interns. Each record contains citations to relevant primary and secondary source material. All annotations are copyright Kentucky Historical Society, and should be referenced as such in any published work.

seriesStmt.title: Civil War Governors of Kentucky Digital Documentary Edition

body.p: Grant County, Kentucky, farmer. Kentucky native. Married to Sophia Foree. Father of Mary Foree, Elizabeth Foree, Joseph Foree, and Nancy F. Foree. Farmer in Grant County in 1850. Farmer in Grant County, Kentucky in 1860. Owned two enslaved individuals in Grant County in 1860.

ab.bibl:
Seventh Manuscript Census of the United States (1850), Population Schedules, Kentucky, Grant County, p. 321 B.
Eighth Manuscript Census of the United States (1860), Population Schedules, Kentucky, Grant County, p. 887.
Eighth Manuscript Census of the United States (1860), Slave Schedules, Kentucky, Grant County, p. 2.
Find A Grave, "Ambrose Foree (Mar 6, 1814-Nov 20, 1886)," Memorial #17343524, http://www.findagrave.com/memorial/17343524 (accessed May 5, 2020).
